## Fitting linear regression model
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
cr_s3_df_ind_left <- read_csv("data/cr_s3_df_ind_left.csv")
```


## Cleaning up data
```{r}
df_mod1 <-
  cr_s3_df_ind_left %>%
    select(-1:-5) %>%
    select(-2:-20)
```


## The model
```{r}
mod1 <- lm(leftstartingtrophies ~ ., data = df_mod1)
summary(mod1)
```
